Reference

All functions

arc()

Arc between two nodes

arrow_fancy()

Arrow polygon.

edge_color_mixer()

A wrapper of colorRamp2

fit_coords_to_dev()

Adjust coordinates to fit aspectt ratio of the device

make_colors() make_edges_colors() make_vertex_colors()

Create a vector of colors for vertices and edges

color_formula() ego() alter()

Formulas in netplot

nplot() print(<netplot>)

Plot a network

nplot_base()

nplot using base graphics

rescale_size()

Rescale the size of a node to make it relative to the aspectt ratio of the device

set_gpar() set_edge_gpar() set_vertex_gpar() get_vertex_gpar() get_edge_gpar() get_gpar()

Set/retrieve graphical parameters of a netplot object
